Interface IAeRecoveredItem

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeRecoveredAddInvokeItem, AeRecoveredAddReceiverItem, AeRecoveredAddReplyItem, AeRecoveredLocationIdItem, AeRecoveredRemoveAlarmItem, AeRecoveredRemoveReceiverItem, AeRecoveredReplyItem, AeRecoveredScheduleAlarmItem, AeRecoveredSendReplyItem
public interface IAeRecoveredItem

Defines the interface for recovered alarm and queue manager items.

Method Summary

          Returns the location id of the activity for the recovered item; may return 0 if the location id is not relevant.
